name: Emirates Skywards ICICI Bank Emeralde Credit Card

renewalWaiver.waiverText: No annual fee waiver available for this card

addOnCard.note: Supplementary cardholders earn Skywards Miles credited to primary cardholder's account

overLimit.note: Over-limit fee NOT applicable for Emirates Emeralde Credit Card

existingRelationship.note: Open to new and existing ICICI Bank customers

creditLimit.factors: Based on income, credit score, existing relationship, and repayment history
creditLimit.enhancementCriteria: Good repayment history and higher credit score

gracePeriod.note: Interest-free period ranges from 18 to 48 days depending on transaction date

minPayment.calculation: 5% of outstanding amount or ₹100, whichever is higher

cashAdvance.note: Cash advance fee waived for Emirates Emeralde Credit Card. Cash limit is 10% of credit limit up to ₹20,000 for first 180 days

upcomingChange.note: Reward rate reduced from 2.5 to 2 Skywards Miles per ₹100 spent from January 15, 2026

rewards.earningText: Earn 2.5 Skywards Miles for every ₹100 spent on eligible domestic and international retail transactions

exclusions.note: From January 15, 2026, no Skywards Miles will be earned on insurance, utility, government, and education payments

caps.note: Reward points will only be earned on capped spend amounts per category. From Jan 15, 2026, no miles on insurance, utility, government, and education

expiry.condition: From the date of the flight or partner transaction that earned them

welcome.description: Get 10,000 Skywards Miles on payment of joining fee + Complimentary Emirates Skywards Silver Tier Membership

travel.note: 2.5 Skywards Miles per ₹100 on all eligible spends

online.note: 2.5 Skywards Miles per ₹100 on all online transactions except excluded categories

fuel.note: No Skywards Miles on fuel transactions

groceries.note: 2.5 Skywards Miles per ₹100, capped at ₹40,000 spend per statement cycle

utilities.note: 1 Skyward Mile per ₹100 spent, capped at ₹80,000 spend per statement cycle. From Jan 15, 2026: No miles on utilities

international.note: 2.5 Skywards Miles per ₹100 on international retail transactions

insurance.note: 1 Skyward Mile per ₹100 spent, capped at ₹80,000 spend per statement cycle. From Jan 15, 2026: No miles on insurance

rent.note: No Skywards Miles on rent payments. 1% fee charged on rent transactions

walletLoads.note: No Skywards Miles on wallet loads

government.note: 1 Skyward Mile per ₹100. From Jan 15, 2026: No miles on government payments

education.note: 1 Skyward Mile per ₹100. From Jan 15, 2026: No miles on education payments

bankPortal.name: iShop
bankPortal.note: Earn up to 4% cashback on iShop portal

redemption.bestOption: Redeem via Emirates Skywards website for flights, upgrades, hotels, and experiences
redemption.note: Skywards Miles can only be redeemed by the primary cardholder via Emirates Skywards website

options.description: Redeem for award flights on Emirates and partner airlines
Upgrade your cabin class on Emirates flights
Book hotel stays through Emirates Skywards
Redeem for exclusive experiences and events
Use Miles at Emirates Official Store and partner retailers

transferPartners.note: Skywards Miles are earned directly to Emirates Skywards account - no transfer partners needed

pooling.note: Emirates Skywards My Family allows pooling of miles among family members

rewards.specialLogic: Skywards Miles are credited directly to the cardholder's Emirates Skywards account within 48 hours of statement generation

spendRequired.note: No spend requirement for domestic lounge access

domestic.note: Unlimited complimentary domestic lounge access for primary cardholder only. Swipe card at lounge for access

accessProvider.newCards: Priority Pass (for cards issued on or after November 15, 2024)

spendRequired.note: No spend requirement for international lounge access

international.note: Unlimited complimentary international lounge access for primary cardholder. Access 1,400+ lounges in 145+ countries with Priority Pass

spa.note: Unlimited complimentary spa sessions at select Indian airports via DreamFolks

milestones.benefit: Emirates Skywards Gold Tier Membership upgrade
milestones.conditions: Must spend at least ₹50,000 on Emirates flights. Gold Tier activates upon payment of annual fee in subsequent year
milestones.renewalRequirement: Must achieve same milestone each year to retain Gold Tier status

welcome.validity: As long as card is active
benefits: Access to Business Class lounge when flying Economy (at selected airports)

upgrade.condition: Spend ₹15 lakh in anniversary year with minimum ₹50,000 on Emirates
upgrade.validity: Upon payment of annual fee after meeting criteria
benefits: Guaranteed Economy seats 24 hours before departure
First Class lounge access when flying Business
Business Class lounge access when flying Economy

silverRetention.note: Silver Tier maintained as long as card is active and annual fee is paid

movies.discount: Up to ₹750 off on second ticket

upcomingChange.newCondition: Spend ₹25,000 in preceding quarter to unlock benefit
upcomingChange.note: From January 15, 2026, BookMyShow benefit requires ₹25,000 quarterly spend

movies.note: Buy one movie/event ticket and get up to ₹750 off on second ticket via BookMyShow, up to 4 times every month

programs.name: ICICI Bank Culinary Treats Programme
programs.note: Exclusive dining offers at partnered restaurants across India

fuel.note: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on fuel transactions up to ₹4,000. Surcharge waiver applicable for spends up to ₹50,000 per statement cycle. No Skywards Miles earned on fuel

dynamicCurrencyConversion.recommendation: Always decline DCC and pay in local currency to get better rates

forex.note: Lower forex markup of 2% for Emeralde card (standard ICICI cards charge 3.5%)

concierge.note: 24x7 concierge service for varied lifestyle and emergency needs

noCostEMI.note: No-cost EMI on select merchants and products

conversionFee.note: Processing fee of 2.99% capped at ₹299 + GST for Instant EMI

emi.note: EMI transactions do not earn Skywards Miles

balanceTransfer.note: Balance transfer transactions do not earn Skywards Miles

memberships.name: Emirates Skywards Silver Tier Membership
memberships.duration: As long as card is active
memberships.note: Complimentary Silver Tier membership with priority check-in, boarding, and extra baggage allowance

memberships.name: Priority Pass (for cards issued after Nov 15, 2024)
memberships.duration: As long as card is active

memberships.name: DreamFolks Membership (for cards issued before Nov 15, 2024)
memberships.duration: As long as card is active

freeCheckedBag.note: Extra baggage allowance as part of Silver/Gold tier benefits

tripCancellation.note: Trip cancellation cover not included. Available on ICICI Emeralde Credit Card (non-Emirates variant)

airAccident.condition: Please refer to insurance policy document for coverage details
airAccident.note: Coverage available through ICICI Lombard General Insurance

travelAccident.note: Coverage available through ICICI Lombard General Insurance

claimsContact.provider: ICICI Lombard General Insurance Co. Ltd.

insurance.note: Insurance coverage provided through ICICI Lombard General Insurance. Please refer to policy document for detailed terms, conditions, and coverage amounts

upiLinking.note: UPI linking available for RuPay credit cards only

upgradesFrom.note: Upgrade from Emirates Skywards Sapphiro to Emeralde available
Upgrade from Emirates Skywards Rubyx to Emeralde available

upgradePathway.note: Emirates Skywards ICICI Bank Emeralde is the premium variant in the Emirates Skywards ICICI card family

meta.bestFor: Frequent Emirates flyers who want to earn Skywards Miles on everyday spends and enjoy unlimited lounge access with airline tier benefits
meta.notRecommendedFor: Those who don't fly Emirates regularly, low spenders, or those who prefer flexible reward redemption options beyond Emirates
meta.verdict: A solid co-branded airline card for Emirates loyalists. The 2.5% Skywards Miles earning rate is attractive, and unlimited lounge access adds good value. The Silver Tier membership (with Gold Tier upgrade option) provides tangible airline benefits. However, the high annual fee with no waiver option, restricted redemption only through Emirates, high forex markup of 3.5%, and upcoming devaluation from Jan 2026 reduce its appeal. Best suited for frequent Emirates flyers who can maximize the airline benefits.
pros: Earn 2.5 Skywards Miles per ₹100 spent (2% effective rate)
Complimentary Emirates Skywards Silver Tier membership
Unlimited domestic and international lounge access
Gold Tier upgrade available on ₹15L annual spend
10,000 Skywards Miles on joining and renewal
Unlimited spa access at select Indian airports
cons: High annual fee of ₹10,000 with no waiver option
Rewards restricted to Emirates Skywards redemption only
Upcoming devaluation from January 15, 2026 (reduced miles, no miles on utilities/insurance)
No reward points on fuel, rent, wallet loads
BookMyShow benefit becoming spend-based from Jan 2026
No transfer partners - locked into Emirates ecosystem

alternatives.reason: Better for non-Emirates specific travel with higher reward rate on iShop
More flexible airline mile transfer partners
Multiple airline transfer partners with better redemption flexibility
Lower annual fee (₹5,000) for occasional Emirates flyers

dataSource: Official ICICI Bank website - Emirates Skywards Emeralde Credit Card page
ICICI Bank MITC document (Most Important Terms & Conditions) dated December 12, 2025
Emirates Skywards ICICI Bank partnership page

changelog.change: Reward rate reduced from 2.5 to 2 Skywards Miles per ₹100
No Skywards Miles on insurance, utility, government, and education payments
BookMyShow benefit becomes spend-based (₹25,000 quarterly spend required)
International lounge access provider changed from DreamFolks to Priority Pass for new cardholders
Spend threshold criteria updated - rent, government, and education payments excluded from annual fee reversal and milestone calculations

changes: No miles on insurance, utility, government, education payments
